name: commodities-compass
description: Monorepo for Commodities Compass - Business Intelligence for commodities trading

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && poetry install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: pnpm run format:backend && pnpm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
